roleset.name: remove the guts from
roleset.note: GUT-V NOTES: Frames file for 'gut' based on sentences in wsj. No access to verbnet at the moment. (from gut.01-v predicate notes)
GUTTING-N NOTES: Added by Julia based on BOLT, gut.01. Corresponds to VNcls pit-10.7. (from gutting.01-n)

example.name: agent as pro
example.text: Oil and auto companies supported a move on Capitol Hill last week [*] to gut Mr. Bush's plans to require auto makers to begin selling alternative-fueled cars by 1995.
example.arg: Mr. Bush's plans to require auto makers to begin selling alternative-fueled cars by 1995

example.name: arg1
example.text: 4 Gutting of Medicare : Elderly Americans will be given a yearly allowance for health coverage

example.name: Both args
example.text: But their gutting of education is paying off, because most people are too stupid to even notice it's happening.
